info.name: Invest Guide
info.description: These routes define the major data flows in the application

request.description: This sends the option ids to the server, which are then used to calculate the risk profile. The server processes the request and returns a JSON response containing the risk profile name and description

response.name: Post question results

request.description: This gets the matching funds for the users risk appetite
